definition: an implement used in baseball by the batter
opposite_reasoning: BaseballBat is a specific physical artifact without a natural antonym. Among available options, AbstractEntity provides the strongest ontological opposition (Physical vs Abstract) which is fundamental in SUMO. While this opposition has limited AI safety utility specifically, it provides mathematically clean separation for concept space structuring.
